title: Fishing Boat (13R48)
text:
Set:	Bloodlines
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gollum
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Possession
Vitality:	+1
Game Text:	Bearer must be Smeagol. When you play Fishing Boat, you may reinforce a [Gollum] token. Each time Smeagol is about to be overwhelmed in a skirmish, you may remove 2 [Gollum] tokens to make him strength +2 until the end of that skirmish.
Rarity:	R
